website_summaries.verdict: Versatile and fun, this airbrush is easy to use on everything from fingernails to motorcycles.
pros: High marks for its effectiveness on projects that require precision
Also stands out for having a nozzle that rarely clogs
Detailed instructions are clear and easy to follow
Made of high-quality copper material with stainless-steel needles
cons: Not following instructions can impact the quality of results

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly Good Airbrush!!
customer_reviews.text: Seriously surprised! I am a seasoned airbrusher and I collect many more expensive brand airbrushes, Japanese , German and American made. Right out of the box , complete with all that you will need to get to painting. One thing missing was lube. The parts are machined well and tight, had to spritz a lil' lube onto the MAC air control screw and BAM!, ready to rock! Trigger response is tight and control valve works as it should. Good looking hand-piece, this one is a keeper. Comes with spare tips and needle in different sizes, moisture trap, adapters, hose and quick disconnect. Price is right!
customer_reviews.author: Mike C.

customer_reviews.title: Almost Good!
customer_reviews.text: Received this product yesterday and i was impressed with the packaging and all accessories it came with. But that's until i tried the airbrush. The button action is a bit too rough and will someone's be stuck! I tried lubricating it but still getting stuck! Took it apart to see what is catching. Looks like the gasket for the plug is a bit too tight! It sprays nicely but your finger will tire out and it's hard to regulate the spray. I was really rooting for this to work good because it's a good looking airbrush. Hopefully it loosens it as i try to use it more.
customer_reviews.author: Randz

customer_reviews.title: disappointed
customer_reviews.text: It's really stiff the button for air and paint is hard to push your finger and hand gets really tired quick maybe it will free up over time it does not spray well as you pull back for paint dead spots where it will stop paint flow and then blast a load of paint the .5 needle does not do that but it's a bit big for the way I paint I polished the needles to see if that would help it did not will keep playing with it maybe I can make it work as of now I'm real disappointed but it is cheap cheap doesn't matter if it doesn't work
customer_reviews.author: larry norton

customer_reviews.title: Replacement parts
customer_reviews.text: I recently put hazed this Air Brush and while inspecting the contents the 0.3mmTip decide to go on a cruise . So I would like to know how I can geja replacement tip. As I do like the Brush and would like to have it complete. Roman Alvarez. bjimnen#aol.com
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for Make up and much more
customer_reviews.text: This gun just became one of the most used pieces of equipment in the house hold. With a wife and 2 daughters who love to do their own make up, this gun has it all. Also great way to start doing their own nails.
customer_reviews.author: Bodynjo

customer_reviews.title: Cheap with a lot of features
customer_reviews.text: A good beginner airbrush. Not super high quality, but many of the features of a fancy one 5 times the price. It does have a super tiny nozzle that is very hard to clean. The .5 needle works pretty well with thinned acrylic paint. No leaks detected. Looking forward to practicing and becoming good enough to use a more expensive one.
customer_reviews.author: ryan k

customer_reviews.title: Good unit
customer_reviews.text: Had a cheap one from Harbor Freight. When I needed it the most it turned into cr**. Bought this one. I don't use one very often but this seems like a great unit for the novice in me to get detail done.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Great airbrush.
customer_reviews.text: For the price range this is a very nice airbrush. Looks great, works great. Like most similar airbrushes it’s easily cleaned and assembled. Good deal!
customer_reviews.author: FantasyBuilder8

customer_reviews.title: Thank you!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this airbrush! Runs great, very smooth, now I just have to figure out the other sizes and how to change them 😁
customer_reviews.author: Leeanna Robinett

customer_reviews.title: Did not received what is pictured.
customer_reviews.text: Received a single-action airbrush where it just has a trigger for paint release. Quick return.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Not useful without an air compres.sor
customer_reviews.text: Can not plug in to use. Need a compressor to use.
customer_reviews.author: Marge Murray

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Really great airbrush. Unfortunately the first one we recieved was defected and had to return it. We decided to buy it again and give it another chance and the second one we recieved is perfect! Does exactly what it's supposed to!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Measures up to the name brands.
customer_reviews.text: Couldn’t backflush by putting a finger over the spray cap like my iwata, but still a good little workhorse of a brush priced much less. Comes with all the accessories too. Definitely will buy again to have a backup.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Lamberson

customer_reviews.title: Works goid
customer_reviews.text: Extra pins are great. Sprays nice. Good for the money
customer_reviews.author: Farmgirl

customer_reviews.title: Your finger will get tired
customer_reviews.text: Does what it's supposed to. The button is pretty hard to pull back
customer_reviews.author: May Houston

customer_reviews.title: Looks good great price
customer_reviews.text: Have only tested it but looks good and price was very good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Seems like a high quality piece
customer_reviews.text: I have no idea how to use an airbrush, but I can paint a car. I can tell from looking at the construction that this is not complete junk. No stripped screws or anything bad.
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: Works good
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mowing literally nothing about airbrushing. I figured the price was middle of the road. I use it to dye leather. After about 15min on YouTube i got it all dialed In and couldn’t be happier
customer_reviews.author: greg

customer_reviews.title: Clogs easy.
customer_reviews.text: Not real good quality. Clogs easy. Even after a thorough cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: DYoung

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: High quality, low price. You can feel the craftsmanship the moment you pick it up.
customer_reviews.author: Mchiz

customer_reviews.title: bad air valve
customer_reviews.text: Received not operative due to bad air valve. Tried to replace, but dealer did not ship replacement in timely manner, so i canceled order. Gave it two stars as others reported no problems and other that the bad valve, it look like it was well made.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer
